code: @Test public void everythingShouldRedirectToLogin() {     ResponseEntity<String> entity = this.restTemplate.getForEntity("/", String.class).     assertThat(entity.getStatusCode()).isEqualTo(HttpStatus.FOUND).     assertThat(entity.getHeaders().getLocation()).isEqualTo(URI.create("http://localhost:" + this.port + "/login")). }

@Test public void loginShouldHaveAllOAuth2ClientsToChooseFrom() {     ResponseEntity<String> entity = this.restTemplate.getForEntity("/login", String.class).     assertThat(entity.getStatusCode()).isEqualTo(HttpStatus.OK).     assertThat(entity.getBody()).contains("/oauth2/authorization/yahoo").     assertThat(entity.getBody()).contains("/oauth2/authorization/github-client-1").     assertThat(entity.getBody()).contains("/oauth2/authorization/github-client-2").     assertThat(entity.getBody()).contains("/oauth2/authorization/github-repos"). }
